name: Picking Up The Pieces (Alisa Bricker)
description:
Project 2 from NU Game A Week 2019. Read full post here.

Everything I touch reminds me of you. What would I look like through someone else's eyes?

Use the mouse to put items back where they belong.

All sounds from Freesound.org. Icons from TheNounProject.com. Background art by Pascal Campion.
